thread.title: Park hits 5th home run of spring as Twins edge Rays
thread.title_full: Park hits 5th home run of spring as Twins edge Rays

title: Park hits 5th home run of spring as Twins edge Rays
text:
Mar 28, 2017 at 9:06p ET 0Shares 
ByungHo Park continued his resurgence, hitting his fifth home run of spring training to help the Minnesota Twins to a 1-0 win over the Tampa Bay Rays on Tuesday. 
Park is hitting .362 with 10 RBIs in 47 spring at-bats this spring. 
Nick Tepesch gave up three hits and a walk over four scoreless innings for Minnesota. 
Tampa Bay’s Chris Archer threw three scoreless innings, giving up one hit and one walk while striking out four. Logan Morrison and Daniel Robertson both went 2 for 3 — the 23-year-old Robertson has a six-game hit streak and is batting .550 during that span. 0
